Articles.Content:
Surviving Gunships Challenge

WELCOME EVERYONE TO THE SURVIVING GUNSHIP CHALLENGE. A CHALLENGE WHERE YOU FLY A GUNSHIP AND TRY TO SURVIVE!

Example:

 

Video by Captain Sparky

Video by Son of Smith

Rules:

1. Do not Take out The AA Gun
2. You can only take out None AA Target (Tanks, Building, IFV etc)
3. You can only survive without refueling and such
4. You can only fly in a gunship (Cargo plane with Radially attach weapons on the side)
5. You can only have 5 Flares and Chaff, and no ECM Jammer as a counter measure
6. Good luck surviving i guess
7. You can takeout the AA once you hit the timer of around 10 minutes
8. You can only fly in the area where the AA can shoots on you

Save file (for those who can't be bothered setting up their own ): WIP

Info:

Mod that are required: BDArmory
How to play: (Screenshot Guide is still WIP)

- Create a setup of AA, Ground Troops (Like tanks, Mechanized and stuff) around KSC
- Create a Gunship to survive with many Gun to protect your self
- Set the Grounds Troops so it can takes out the Gunship 
- Before taking Off, Put all the AA and Ground Troops on the Same Teams and set it to Guard mode.
- Once takes off, go to alt of around 17.000 (AKA Safezone).
- Once you reach Safezone, set your gunship to a different Team than the AA
- Start your Timer and Decent to the 2.000M
- Good luck on surviving
- Once you done, post the recording to here
Note: You can adjust your Fuel limits to How long you want

Leaderboard:

Edited June 20, 2019 by Mukita12
Looks like nobody is interested. Oh well

28 minutes ago, Mukita12 said:

Looks like nobody is interested. Oh well

Some challenges take a bit to get rolling, so I wouldn't lose all hope.

However, the requirements are a bit..vague, and it sound like a lot of work to set up.

Perhaps you should consider simplifying it, or providing a save file with the situation already set up? It's also considered "good form" to complete a challenge yourself first before offering it. Show us some screenshots, or even better a video of you doing what you described, it would also give people a better idea of what you are looking for.
